mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN (PKID, CASE_CODE, PART_CODE, EST_PART_TIME,LAMP_STATUS,RED_LOCK,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lampStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redLock,jdbcType=CHAR},GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID})

insert into sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
PART_CODE,
EST_PART_TIME,
LAMP_STATUS,
RED_LOCK,
CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lampStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{redLock,jdbcType=CHAR},
GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EST_PART_TIME = #{estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAMP_STATUS = #{lampStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RED_LOCK = #{redLock,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), CREATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAMP_STATUS = #{lampStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RED_LOCK = #{redLock,jdbcType=CHAR}, EST_PART_TIME = #{estPartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), CREATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT p.PART_CODE as partCode, p.CASE_CODE as caseCode, p.EST_PART_TIME as estParTtime, prop.PROPERTY_ADDR as propertyAddr FROM sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN p with(nolock) INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c with(nolock) ON c.CASE_CODE=p.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR s with(nolock) ON s.CASE_CODE=p.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.SYS_DICT d with(nolock) ON d.Type=s.srv_code INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO prop with(nolock) ON prop.CASE_CODE=p.CASE_CODE WHERE s.PROCESSOR_ID= #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.CASE_PROPERTY='30003003' AND p.PART_CODE=d.CODE

SELECT A.PART_CODE as partCode, A.CASE_CODE as caseCode, A.EST_PART_TIME as estParTtime, C.PROPERTY_ADDR as propertyAddr FROM sctrans.T_TO_TRANS_PLAN AS A LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO AS C ON A.CASE_CODE = C.CASE_CODE WHERE A.CASE_CODE IN( ( SELECT CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR WHERE 1=1 AND PROCESSOR_ID = #{leadingProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
